hadiths.text: Ibn 'Abbas said:"Should I perform Wudu' after eating food that I see in the Book of Allah is permissible because fire has touched it?" Abu Hurairah gathered some pebbles and said: "I bear witness (as many times as) the number of these pebbles, that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: 'Perform Wudu' from that which has been touched by fire
